statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password = 'password123' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email <> 'test@example.com' AND username LIKE '%user%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM Users u JOIN Permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, p.permission_name FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id > 2;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_permissions > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM authentication WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM authentication ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT login_time, username FROM authentication JOIN user_accounts ON authentication.user_id = user_accounts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id
SELECT u.username, a.token, a.last_login FROM users u INNER JOIN authentication a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM authentication_tokens ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM peer_review_comments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_type FROM user_accounts u JOIN user_permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS comment_count FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN peer_review_comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(c.comment_id) > 0;
SELECT u.username, AVG(r.rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN peer_review_ratings r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING AVG(r.rating_value) > 3;
